messageBody:
Elliotte Harold wrote:

>Why not install a SecurityManager that blocks calls to System.exit() by
>throwing a SecurityException, which you then catch? A littl ehackisjh
>but it should work.
>
>
>

And it's a shame that we have to do hackish things to test code that
uses vendor supplied APIs, isn't it?

At XpDay in Montreal this month, I'll be talking about the problem and
ways to design APIs so that testing doesn't have to be a hack.

Michael Feathers
